Text: No worries about audio. Big thanxs about bringing this basho for everybody!
Yes everyone please seed. I seeded for 2 weeks after basho. Also, is there anyway you can make these a bit smaller?

Thank You zlo666. We all here have been praying you would do your fabulous job again this basho.  You are a god send.  The videos are great - better even than ESPN used to do. I will seed til DLing stops.  Cheers
Size is ok because quality is ok. My vote would be that lets do not compromise too much about quality in order to get size smaller. Off course uploader decides ;-)

Great! Thanks! BTW, it anyone wants the MATCHES ONLY I have day one that way here: http://thepiratebay.org/tor/3887037/Kyushu_Basho_2007_-_Day_1_-_Sumo_LITE_-_Matches_ONLY.mpg

Will do day 2 ASAP.
Just curious. Did you get day 2? I know that last basho you had a glitch. Appreciate the work you do. Just fiending!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Appreciate it, but i'd rather get the whole thing if possible. If zlo666 didn't get it, i'll certainly give yours a go. Matches are better than nothing. :)
If you have the whole thing, please post it. Folks would be very appreciative.
